snippet: South Africa and the Cape Verde Islands were knocked out of the African Nations Cup by Mali and Ghana in the quarterfinals.
abstract: Mali national soccer team defeats South Africa and Ghana defeats Cape Verde Islands in African Cup of Nations quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: South Africa and the Cape Verde Islands were knocked out of the African Nations Cup by Mali and Ghana in the quarterfinals.

headline.main: 2 Bow Out of African Nations Cup
headline.print_headline: Two Teams Out in Africa Cup
